mapper.insert: insert into party (leader_id, category_no, party_name, party_quota, party_description, party_filename) values (#{leader.id}, #{category.no}, #{name}, #{quota}, #{description}, #{filename})
mapper.select: select party_no as no, leader_id as leaderId, category_no as categoryNo, party_name as partyName, party_cur_cnt as partyCurCnt, party_quota as partyQuota, party_status as partyStatus, created_at as createAt, updated_at as updateAt, party_description as partyDescription, party_filename as partyFilename from party where party_no = #{value}
